gemini.prompt:
Create a character portrait in webtoon art style.

Requirements:
- Upper body portrait (head to waist or chest)
- Neutral expression showing character's personality
- Clean background (solid color or simple gradient)
- High quality, detailed illustration
- Consistent with webtoon/manhwa aesthetic
- Front-facing, looking slightly towards viewer
- Vertical composition suitable for character card


Character: Elara
Age: 17
Physical appearance: Ethereal, pale skin, delicate features but with a commanding posture.
Visual details: Hair: Knee-length jet black hair, straight, usually worn loose, Eyes: Crimson red (classic vampire) but soft when looking at Ren, Face: Perfect porcelain skin, heart-shaped face, OUTFIT: White Victorian gothic blouse with high lace collar, deep crimson corset vest, floor-length black skirt with slit, Accessory: A velvet choker with a ruby pendant
Personality (for expression): Compassionate, rebellious against tradition, secretly studies forbidden healing magic.
